Text: I want to say thank you so much for sharing QI over here to the US (and everywhere). I don't know why the stupid "BBC America" channel just shows re-runs of Star Trek when there are so many great British shows I can't get my hands on. Thank you so much for your efforts. Please keep posting QI- you make me very happy.

The reason they cannot show QI in America is the copyrights of some of the pictures they show in the background.

Sounds weird, but apparently at least some of them would be very expensive. If QI is ever crossing the ocean, they will probably just do a remake.
